title: Inventory Valuation Report
summary: This spreadsheet, titled 'GMBH_FinishedGoods_Translated (1).xlsx', provides a detailed inventory valuation report. It includes data on part numbers, descriptions, valuation basis units, quantities, values, and various financial metrics. Key columns include 'part_no', 'description', 'quantity', 'value', 'posted_stock_adjustment', 'purchase_order', 'sales_order', and 'total_cost'. The data is organized to track inventory movements, financial adjustments, and stock levels across different time frames, such as 'purchases_last_12_months' and 'net_ordered_value_12_months'.
